introduction.title: Ukrainian Digital Agency
introduction.body: We provide recruitment and lead generation services in IT.
introduction.body2: Get your first candidates or leads within a

info.title: Info
info.info1: We are a Ukrainian digital agency, providing mid-senior level IT specialists and leads to Clients all over the world. Our mission is to simplify the search for new clients and employees for businesses. To achieve this, we have high-caliber teams specializing in lead generation and recruiting with experience in European, CIS, North American, and South American markets.
info.info2: We provide our clients with a comprehensive range of recruitment solutions, encompassing everything from crafting job descriptions and advertising to pre-screening, interviewing, and ensuring that the selected candidate aligns seamlessly with both the role and the team. Additionally, we excel in lead generation solutions, which include developing Ideal Customer Profiles (ICP), fine-tuning lead search processes, prospecting, lead generation, and offering assistance in optimizing the sales process. Our unwavering dedication is to unearth top-tier talent and clients who will ignite your company's growth.

block1.title: Lead Generation
block1.text: Our lead generation service is designed to supercharge your business by connecting you with high-potential prospects. We employ cutting-edge strategies to identify and engage potential customers, delivering a steady stream of qualified leads to fuel your sales and marketing efforts. Elevate your business to new heights with our expertly crafted lead generation solutions.

block2.title: Recruiting
block2.text: We have a team of recruiters to find and review relevant CVs, assess candidates and assist in the final selection process. Our flexibility allows us to achieve more than any recruiting department.

block3.title: HR Consulting
block3.text: We help companies improve  their HR practices, and also provide the opportunity to sign a short-term contract with our specialist to work in-house for urgent tasks.
